FIX-LEAK.title: Fix 8000 Housing Loan Leak
FIX-LEAK.instruction:
Fix the 8000 monetary leak in housing purchase. The loan_proceeds transfer must originate from the BANK, not the buyer. Target: simulation/utils/simulation_builder.py (escrow logic).

FIX-CRISIS.title: Fix Crisis Monitor OSError
FIX-CRISIS.instruction:
Fix the OSError in modules/analysis/crisis_monitor.py caused by MagicMock being used as a filename. This blocks all system tests.

FIX-TESTS.title: Fix Integration and System Tests
FIX-TESTS.instruction:
Fix all failing integration and system tests (28 failed, 11 errors). Update Mock objects to match refactored agent state (_econ_state removal). Correct DTO signatures and method calls. Do NOT modify core simulation code.
